job.title: Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description:
Do you want to work for an Emmy® Award-winning company? At Audible Magic we are building the most revolutionary media recognition technology and rights management solutions for the global music, movie and television industry. Our customers and partners include some of the largest and most recognized brands in the industry. We win awards because we keep driving to provide better solutions for our customers, solutions that meet the needs of the ever-changing music and entertainment industry. At Audible Magic we believe our customers are paramount, and our reputation and integrity are the foundation of our business.
We are seeking a Software Engineer to join our team developing and supporting an existing Music Streaming Platform. The successful candidate will join a small team of engineers supporting and extending this profitable and growing product line.
This role qualifies for a
hybrid work schedule
Responsibilities
Maintain and extend code base for delivering music streams and downloads to enterprise customers
Develop new features for Music Streaming Service
Partner with Product Management and Engineering Leadership to design new features and review technical architecture and specifications
Work with broader Engineering team on technology upgrades for the Music Streaming Service
Partner with other Engineering Teams to fulfill product development and customer deliverables
Clearly communicate status and open issues to team leads and managers
Create and maintain product documentation and developer docs
Requirements
Solid basic Java skills. We use some Spring, but mostly for dependency injection.
3 years minimum of relevant experience
Solid RDBMS/SQL skills
Solid Oracle and PL/SQL experience
SQL Server/Transact SQL knowledge
C#/.NET and JavaScript skills
Good knowledge of web services, both SOAP and REST
Proficiency with XML and related concepts and technologies
Proficiency with shell scripting
Nice to have
Familiarity with WildFly (formerly JBoss) Java application server
Familiarity with Tomcat web container
Familiarity with Apache HTTP server
Knowledge of Perl programming language
Familiarity with Lucene (text indexing) framework
Knowledge of Postgres DBS
Knowledge of Apache CXF web services framework
Experience with DW design and concepts
Basic understanding of TCP/IP concepts and networking in general
Basic knowledge of CDNs
